aboutInfo: Experience Malta like never before in our unique 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom Penthouse in Ta' Xbiex. With stunning sea views overlooking Valletta, this spacious retreat offers the perfect getaway. A fully-equipped kitchen invites culinary adventures.The expansive terrace, complete with a BBQ, is ideal for al fresco dining while enjoying the breathtaking scenery.But the real highlight? Your own private pool, perfect for cooling off or soaking in the Mediterranean sun!
